short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple task tracker for managing anxiety. Extension by Will Churchill.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple task list extension that opens a to-do list when a new tab is opened. 

Tasks can be adding in blocks - one of 4, one of 3, one of 2, and one of 1. This helps breakdown overwhelming task lists into more manageable chunks.
